results.name: If n = Product (p_j^k_j) then a(n) = Sum (p_j^k_j) (a(1) = 1 by convention).
comment: A variant of A008475, which is the main entry.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384

Nussbaum, Roger D.; Verduyn Lunel, Sjoerd M., Asymptotic estimates for the periods of periodic points of non-expansive maps, Ergodic Theory Dynam. Systems 23 (2003), no. 4, 1199--1226. See the function S(n). MR1997973 (2004m:37033)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 28 2013
